main.name: Anthony Parker Ryan
main.description: I'm also a sound designer, aspiring mycologist, UX designer, and sci-fi aficionado (of course).
main.contactmessage: Interested in my work? Feel free to reach out and say hello!

resume.skillmessage: While building solutions at work, at school, or on hobby projects, I've rapidly picked up a variety of skills - in a variety of depths!

work.company: Center for Robotics and Biosystems at Northwestern
work.title: Research Assistant
work.description:
Designed and rapid prototyped robotic agents and control systems using wireless communications with ESP32 BLE and Wi-Fi, as well as localization with machine vision and control theory implemented in C/C++. 
Trained and managed a team of undergraduate researchers in novel software tools and CAD modeling projects. 
Performed and analyzed experiments on live mice and robotic agents, involving hardware (PCB design and soldering) & software (networking and computer vision) debugging, as well as vocal spectrographic analysis

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description:
Cultivated $500k/year of online sales after launching an e-commerce site and fulfillment center during first month of coronavirus lockdown, working across teams to transition software from service to product sales. 
Constructed a booking and membership management app in Swift for iOS and React for web ~125k MAU. 
Increased employee utilization rate by 20% by bringing together customer service teams’ workflows through custom automation in PHP and Python to reduce repetition and eliminate error-prone employee processes

work.title: Software Intern
work.description: Worked intermittently with a small team of programmers and independently, updated and debugged the Wonder iOS App, learned and used several technologies to create helper apps including Docker, Zapier, Slack, and AWS Lambda Headless Servers, working interchangeably in PHP, Python, and Swift. Additionally, lead the Wonder team to an integration with SUGARED + BRONZED in order to provide clients with real time rewards for purchases.
